00044 //Define generator - this can be global because its using convert internally
00045 template<typename SRC, typename DST> class TypeGenerator: public TypeConverterBase
00046 {
00047 public:
00048     boost::numeric::range_check_result generate( const TypeBase &src, boost::scoped_ptr<TypeBase>& dst )const {
00049         LOG_IF( dst.get(), Debug, warning ) <<
00050                                             "Generating into existing value " << dst->toString( true ) << " (dropping this).";
00051         Type<DST> *ref = new Type<DST>;
00052         const boost::numeric::range_check_result result = convert( src.cast_to_Type<SRC>(), *ref );
00053         dst.reset( ref );
00054         return result;
00055     }
00056 };
00057 
00059 // general converter version -- does nothing
00061 template<bool NUMERIC, bool SAME, typename SRC, typename DST> class TypeConverter : public TypeGenerator<SRC, DST>
00062 {
00063 public:
00064     virtual ~TypeConverter() {}
00065 };
00067 // trivial version -- for conversion of the same type
00069 template<bool NUMERIC, typename SRC, typename DST> class TypeConverter<NUMERIC, true, SRC, DST> : public TypeGenerator<SRC, DST>
00070 {
00071     TypeConverter() {
00072         LOG( Debug, verbose_info )
00073                 << "Creating trivial copy converter for " << Type<SRC>::staticName();
00074     };
00075 public:
00076     static boost::shared_ptr<const TypeConverterBase> create() {
00077         TypeConverter<NUMERIC, true, SRC, DST> *ret = new TypeConverter<NUMERIC, true, SRC, DST>;
00078         return boost::shared_ptr<const TypeConverterBase>( ret );
00079     }
00080     boost::numeric::range_check_result convert( const TypeBase &src, TypeBase &dst )const {
00081         SRC &dstVal = dst.cast_to<SRC>();
00082         const SRC &srcVal = src.cast_to<SRC>();
00083         dstVal = srcVal;
00084         return boost::numeric::cInRange;
00085     }
00086     virtual ~TypeConverter() {}
00087 };

00091 // Numeric version -- uses boost::numeric_cast
00093 struct NumericOverflowHandler {
00094     static boost::numeric::range_check_result result;
00095     void operator() ( boost::numeric::range_check_result r ) { // throw bad_numeric_conversion derived
00096         result = r;
00097     }
00098 };
00099 boost::numeric::range_check_result NumericOverflowHandler::result = boost::numeric::cInRange;
00100 
00101 template<typename SRC, typename DST> class TypeConverter<true, false, SRC, DST> : public TypeGenerator<SRC, DST>
00102 {
00103     TypeConverter() {
00104         LOG( Debug, verbose_info )
00105                 << "Creating numeric converter from "
00106                 << Type<SRC>::staticName() << " to " << Type<DST>::staticName();
00107     };
00108 public:
00109     static boost::shared_ptr<const TypeConverterBase> create() {
00110         TypeConverter<true, false, SRC, DST> *ret = new TypeConverter<true, false, SRC, DST>;
00111         return boost::shared_ptr<const TypeConverterBase>( ret );
00112     }
00113     boost::numeric::range_check_result convert( const TypeBase &src, TypeBase &dst )const {
00114         typedef boost::numeric::converter <
00115         DST, SRC,
00116            boost::numeric::conversion_traits<DST, SRC>,
00117            NumericOverflowHandler,
00118            boost::numeric::RoundEven<SRC>
00119            > converter;
00120         DST &dstVal = dst.cast_to<DST>();
00121         const SRC &srcVal = src.cast_to<SRC>();
00122         NumericOverflowHandler::result = boost::numeric::cInRange;
00123         dstVal = converter::convert( srcVal );
00124         return NumericOverflowHandler::result;
00125     }
00126     virtual ~TypeConverter() {}
00127 };
00128 
00130 // vector4 version -- uses TypeConverter on every element
00132 template<typename SRC, typename DST > class TypeConverter<false, false, vector4<SRC>, vector4<DST> >: public TypeGenerator<vector4<SRC>, vector4<DST> >
00133 {
00134     boost::shared_ptr<const TypeConverterBase> m_conv;
00135     TypeConverter( boost::shared_ptr<const TypeConverterBase> elem_conv ): m_conv( elem_conv ) {
00136         LOG( Debug, verbose_info )
00137                 << "Creating vector converter from "
00138                 << Type<vector4<SRC> >::staticName() << " to " << Type<vector4<DST> >::staticName();
00139     };
00140 public:
00141     static boost::shared_ptr<const TypeConverterBase> create() {
00142         typedef boost::mpl::and_<boost::is_arithmetic<SRC>, boost::is_arithmetic<DST> > is_num;
00143         typedef boost::is_same<SRC, DST> is_same;
00144         boost::shared_ptr<const TypeConverterBase> elem_conv =
00145             TypeConverter<is_num::value, is_same::value, SRC, DST>::create();
00146 
00147         if ( elem_conv ) {
00148             TypeConverter<false, false, vector4<SRC>, vector4<DST> > *ret = new TypeConverter<false, false, vector4<SRC>, vector4<DST> >( elem_conv );
00149             return boost::shared_ptr<const TypeConverterBase>( ret );
00150         } else {
00151             return boost::shared_ptr<const TypeConverterBase>();
00152         }
00153     }
00154     boost::numeric::range_check_result convert( const TypeBase &src, TypeBase &dst )const {
00155         vector4<DST> &dstVal = dst.cast_to<vector4<DST> >();
00156         const vector4<SRC> &srcVal = src.cast_to<vector4<SRC> >();
00157         boost::numeric::range_check_result ret = boost::numeric::cInRange;
00158 
00159         for ( int i = 0; i < 4; i++ ) {//slow and ugly, but flexible
00160             Type<DST> dst;
00161             const boost::numeric::range_check_result result = m_conv->convert( Type<SRC>( srcVal[i] ), dst );
00162 
00163             if ( result != boost::numeric::cInRange )
00164                 ret = result;
00165 
00166             dstVal[i] = ( DST )dst;
00167         }
00168 
00169         return ret;
00170     }
00171     virtual ~TypeConverter() {}
00172 };
00173 
00175 // list version -- uses TypeConverter on every element
00177 template<typename SRC, typename DST > class TypeConverter<false, false, std::list<SRC>, std::list<DST> >: public TypeGenerator<std::list<SRC>, std::list<DST> >
00178 {
00179     boost::shared_ptr<const TypeConverterBase> m_conv;
00180     TypeConverter( boost::shared_ptr<const TypeConverterBase> elem_conv ): m_conv( elem_conv ) {
00181         LOG( Debug, verbose_info )
00182                 << "Creating list converter from "
00183                 << Type<std::list<SRC> >::staticName() << " to " << Type<std::list<DST> >::staticName();
00184     };
00185 public:
00186     static boost::shared_ptr<const TypeConverterBase> create() {
00187         typedef boost::mpl::and_<boost::is_arithmetic<SRC>, boost::is_arithmetic<DST> > is_num;
00188         typedef boost::is_same<SRC, DST> is_same;
00189         boost::shared_ptr<const TypeConverterBase> elem_conv =
00190             TypeConverter<is_num::value, is_same::value, SRC, DST>::create();
00191 
00192         if ( elem_conv ) {
00193             TypeConverter<false, false, std::list<SRC>, std::list<DST> > *ret = new TypeConverter<false, false, std::list<SRC>, std::list<DST> >( elem_conv );
00194             return boost::shared_ptr<const TypeConverterBase>( ret );
00195         } else {
00196             return boost::shared_ptr<const TypeConverterBase>();
00197         }
00198     }
00199     boost::numeric::range_check_result convert( const TypeBase &src, TypeBase &dst )const {
00200         std::list<DST> &dstVal = dst.cast_to<std::list<DST> >();
00201         LOG_IF( ! dstVal.empty(), CoreLog, warning )
00202                 << "Storing into non empty list while conversion from "
00203                 << Type<std::list<SRC> >::staticName() << " to " << Type<std::list<DST> >::staticName();
00204         const std::list<SRC> &srcVal = src.cast_to<std::list<SRC> >();
00205         boost::numeric::range_check_result ret = boost::numeric::cInRange;
00206 
00207         for ( typename std::list<SRC>::const_iterator i = srcVal.begin(); i != srcVal.end(); i++ ) {//slow and ugly, but flexible
00208             Type<DST> dst;
00209             const boost::numeric::range_check_result result = m_conv->convert( Type<SRC>( *i ), dst );
00210 
00211             if ( result != boost::numeric::cInRange )
00212                 ret = result;
00213 
00214             dstVal.push_back( ( DST )dst );
00215         }
00216 
00217         return ret;
00218     }
00219     virtual ~TypeConverter() {}
00220 };

00224 // string version -- uses lexical_cast to convert from/to string
00226 template<typename DST> class TypeConverter<false, false, std::string, DST> : public TypeGenerator<std::string, DST>
00227 {
00228     TypeConverter() {
00229         LOG( Debug, verbose_info )
00230                 << "Creating from-string converter for " << Type<DST>::staticName();
00231     };
00232 public:
00233     static boost::shared_ptr<const TypeConverterBase> create() {
00234         TypeConverter<false, false, std::string, DST> *ret = new TypeConverter<false, false, std::string, DST>;
00235         return boost::shared_ptr<const TypeConverterBase>( ret );
00236     }
00237     boost::numeric::range_check_result convert( const TypeBase &src, TypeBase &dst )const {
00238         DST &dstVal = dst.cast_to<DST>();
00239         const std::string &srcVal = src.cast_to<std::string>();
00240         dstVal = boost::lexical_cast<DST>( srcVal );
00241         return boost::numeric::cInRange; //@todo handle bad casts
00242     }
00243     virtual ~TypeConverter() {}
00244 };
00245 template<typename SRC> class TypeConverter<false, false, SRC, std::string> : public TypeGenerator<SRC, std::string>
00246 {
00247     TypeConverter() {
00248         LOG( Debug, verbose_info )
00249                 << "Creating to-string converter for " << Type<SRC>::staticName();
00250     };
00251 public:
00252     static boost::shared_ptr<const TypeConverterBase> create() {
00253         TypeConverter<false, false, SRC, std::string> *ret = new TypeConverter<false, false, SRC, std::string>;
00254         return boost::shared_ptr<const TypeConverterBase>( ret );
00255     }
00256     boost::numeric::range_check_result convert( const TypeBase &src, TypeBase &dst )const {
00257         std::string &dstVal = dst.cast_to<std::string>();
00258         const SRC &srcVal = src.cast_to<SRC>();
00259         dstVal = boost::lexical_cast<std::string, SRC>( srcVal );
00260         return boost::numeric::cInRange; // this should allways be ok
00261     }
00262     virtual ~TypeConverter() {}
00263 };

00266 // special version to convert from string to a given selection
00267 // (lexical_cast doesnt work here, because it creates a temporary buffer)
00269 template<> class TypeConverter<false, false, std::string, Selection> : public TypeGenerator<std::string, Selection>
00270 {
00271     TypeConverter() {
00272         LOG( Debug, verbose_info )
00273                 << "Creating special from-string converter for " << Type<Selection>::staticName();
00274     };
00275 public:
00276     static boost::shared_ptr<const TypeConverterBase> create() {
00277         TypeConverter<false, false, std::string, Selection> *ret = new TypeConverter<false, false, std::string, Selection>;
00278         return boost::shared_ptr<const TypeConverterBase>( ret );
00279     }
00280     boost::numeric::range_check_result convert( const TypeBase &src, TypeBase &dst )const {
00281         Selection &dstVal = dst.cast_to<Selection>();
00282         const std::string &srcVal = src.cast_to<std::string>();
00283 
00284         if ( dstVal.set( srcVal.c_str() ) )
00285             return boost::numeric::cInRange;
00286         else
00287             return boost::numeric::cPosOverflow; //if the string is not "part" of the selection we count this as positive overflow
00288     }
00289     virtual ~TypeConverter() {}
00290 };

00294 // string/bool version -- uses decision based on text
00296 template<> class TypeConverter<false, false, std::string, bool> : public TypeGenerator<std::string, bool>
00297 {
00298     TypeConverter() {
00299         LOG( Debug, verbose_info )
00300                 << "Creating special from-string converter for " << Type<bool>::staticName();
00301     };
00302 public:
00303     static boost::shared_ptr<const TypeConverterBase> create() {
00304         TypeConverter<false, false, std::string, bool> *ret = new TypeConverter<false, false, std::string, bool>;
00305         return boost::shared_ptr<const TypeConverterBase>( ret );
00306     }
00307     boost::numeric::range_check_result convert( const TypeBase &src, TypeBase &dst )const {
00308         bool &dstVal = dst.cast_to<bool>();
00309         const std::string srcVal = boost::algorithm::to_lower_copy<std::string>( src.cast_to<std::string>() );
00310 
00311         if (  srcVal == "true" || srcVal == "y" || srcVal == "yes" ) {
00312             dstVal = true;
00313         } else if ( srcVal == "false" || srcVal == "n" || srcVal == "no" ) {
00314             dstVal = false;
00315         } else {
00316             LOG( Runtime, warning ) << src.toString( true ) << " is ambiguous while converting to " << Type<bool>::staticName();
00317             return boost::numeric::cPosOverflow;
00318         }
00319 
00320         return boost::numeric::cInRange;
00321     }
00322     virtual ~TypeConverter() {}
00323 };
00324 template<> class TypeConverter<false, false, bool, std::string> : public TypeGenerator<bool, std::string>
00325 {
00326     TypeConverter() {
00327         LOG( Debug, verbose_info )
00328                 << "Creating special to-string converter for " << Type<bool>::staticName();
00329     };
00330 public:
00331     static boost::shared_ptr<const TypeConverterBase> create() {
00332         TypeConverter<false, false, bool, std::string> *ret = new TypeConverter<false, false, bool, std::string>;
00333         return boost::shared_ptr<const TypeConverterBase>( ret );
00334     }
00335     boost::numeric::range_check_result convert( const TypeBase &src, TypeBase &dst )const {
00336         std::string &dstVal = dst.cast_to<std::string>();
00337         const bool &srcVal = src.cast_to<bool>();
00338         dstVal = srcVal ? "true" : "false";
00339         return boost::numeric::cInRange;
00340     }
00341     virtual ~TypeConverter() {}
00342 };

00346 // string => list/vector version -- uses util::string2list
00348 template<typename DST> class TypeConverter<false, false, std::string, std::list<DST> >: public TypeGenerator<std::string, std::list<DST> >  //string => list
00349 {
00350     TypeConverter() {
00351         LOG( Debug, verbose_info )
00352                 << "Creating from-string converter for " << Type<std::list<DST> >::staticName();
00353     };
00354 public:
00355     static boost::shared_ptr<const TypeConverterBase> create() {
00356         TypeConverter<false, false, std::string, std::list<DST> > *ret = new TypeConverter<false, false, std::string, std::list<DST> >;
00357         return boost::shared_ptr<const TypeConverterBase>( ret );
00358     }
00359     boost::numeric::range_check_result convert( const TypeBase &src, TypeBase &dst )const {
00360         std::list<DST> &dstVal = dst.cast_to<std::list<DST> >();
00361         LOG_IF( ! dstVal.empty(), CoreLog, warning )
00362                 << "Conversion from " << Type<std::string>::staticName()
00363                 << " into non empty list  " << Type<std::list<DST> >::staticName()
00364                 << " previous content will be lost";
00365         const std::string &srcVal = src.cast_to<std::string>();
00366         const std::list<DST> buff = util::string2list<DST>( srcVal, boost::regex( "[\\s,;]+" ) );
00367         dstVal.assign( buff.begin(), buff.end() );
00368         return boost::numeric::cInRange;  //@todo handle bad casts
00369     }
00370     virtual ~TypeConverter() {}
00371 };
00372 template<typename DST> class TypeConverter<false, false, std::string, vector4<DST> >: public TypeGenerator<std::string, vector4<DST> >  //string => vector4
00373 {
00374     TypeConverter() {
00375         LOG( Debug, verbose_info )
00376                 << "Creating from-string converter for " << Type<vector4<DST> >::staticName();
00377     };
00378 public:
00379     static boost::shared_ptr<const TypeConverterBase> create() {
00380         TypeConverter<false, false, std::string, vector4<DST> > *ret = new TypeConverter<false, false, std::string, vector4<DST> >;
00381         return boost::shared_ptr<const TypeConverterBase>( ret );
00382     }
00383     boost::numeric::range_check_result convert( const TypeBase &src, TypeBase &dst )const {
00384         vector4<DST> &dstVal = dst.cast_to<vector4<DST> >();
00385         const std::string &srcVal = src.cast_to<std::string>();
00386         const std::list<DST> buff = string2list<DST>( srcVal, boost::regex( "[\\s,;]+" ) );
00387         dstVal.copyFrom( buff.begin(), buff.end() );
00388         return boost::numeric::cInRange; //@todo handle bad casts
00389     }
00390     virtual ~TypeConverter() {}
00391 };

00410 
00412 template<typename SRC> struct inner_TypeConverter {
00413     std::map<int, boost::shared_ptr<const TypeConverterBase> > &m_subMap;
00414     inner_TypeConverter( std::map<int, boost::shared_ptr<const TypeConverterBase> > &subMap ): m_subMap( subMap ) {}
00415     template<typename DST> void operator()( DST ) { //will be called by the mpl::for_each in outer_TypeConverter for any DST out of "types"
00416         //create a converter based on the type traits and the types of SRC and DST
00417         typedef boost::mpl::and_<boost::is_arithmetic<SRC>, boost::is_arithmetic<DST> > is_num;
00418         typedef boost::is_same<SRC, DST> is_same;
00419         boost::shared_ptr<const TypeConverterBase> conv =
00420             TypeConverter<is_num::value, is_same::value, SRC, DST>::create();
00421         //and insert it into the to-conversion-map of SRC
00422         m_subMap.insert( m_subMap.end(), std::make_pair( Type<DST>::staticID, conv ) );
00423     }
00424 };
00425 
00427 struct outer_TypeConverter {
00428     std::map< int , std::map<int, boost::shared_ptr<const TypeConverterBase> > > &m_map;
00429     outer_TypeConverter( std::map< int , std::map<int, boost::shared_ptr<const TypeConverterBase> > > &map ): m_map( map ) {}
00430     template<typename SRC> void operator()( SRC ) {//will be called by the mpl::for_each in TypeConverterMap() for any SRC out of "types"
00431         boost::mpl::for_each<types>( // create a functor for from-SRC-conversion and call its ()-operator for any DST out of "types"
00432             inner_TypeConverter<SRC>( m_map[Type<SRC>().typeID()] )
00433         );
00434     }
00435 };
00437 
00438 TypeConverterMap::TypeConverterMap()
00439 {
00440     boost::mpl::for_each<types>( outer_TypeConverter( *this ) );
00441     LOG( Debug, info ) << "conversion map for " << size() << " types created";
00442 }
00443 
00444 }
00445 }
